scrappeyApiKey.title: Scrappey API Key
scrappeyApiKey.description: Your Scrappey API key. Get one at https://scrappey.com

url.title: Target URL
url.description: The URL of the website to scrape

cmd.title: HTTP Method
cmd.description: The HTTP method to use for the request

postData.title: Request Body (POST/PUT/PATCH)
postData.description: Data to send with POST, PUT, or PATCH requests. Can be form data or JSON.

requestType.title: Request Type
requestType.description: Use 'browser' for full browser rendering (slower, handles JS) or 'request' for HTTP-only mode (faster, cheaper)

proxyCountry.title: Proxy Country
proxyCountry.description: Request a proxy from a specific country (e.g., UnitedStates, Germany, UnitedKingdom)

proxy.title: Custom Proxy
proxy.description: Custom proxy URL in format: http://username:password@ip:port

premiumProxy.title: Use Premium Proxy
premiumProxy.description: Use premium residential proxies for better success rates

session.title: Session ID
session.description: Session ID for maintaining state across requests. Leave empty for automatic session.

browserActions.title: Browser Actions
browserActions.description: Array of browser automation actions (click, type, scroll, wait, etc.)

automaticallySolveCaptchas.title: Automatically Solve Captchas
automaticallySolveCaptchas.description: Automatically solve detected captchas (reCAPTCHA, hCaptcha, Turnstile)

alwaysLoad.title: Always Load Captcha Types
alwaysLoad.description: Captcha types to always load solvers for: recaptcha, hcaptcha, turnstile

datadomeBypass.title: Datadome Bypass
datadomeBypass.description: Enable Datadome-specific bypass using specialized solver

screenshot.title: Capture Screenshot
screenshot.description: Capture a screenshot of the page

screenshotUpload.title: Upload Screenshot
screenshotUpload.description: Upload screenshot to storage and return URL

cssSelector.title: CSS Selector
cssSelector.description: Extract content matching this CSS selector

innerText.title: Include Inner Text
innerText.description: Include the inner text content of the page

includeImages.title: Include Images
includeImages.description: Include all image URLs found on the page

includeLinks.title: Include Links
includeLinks.description: Include all link URLs found on the page

customHeaders.title: Custom Headers
customHeaders.description: Custom HTTP headers to send with the request

cookiejar.title: Cookie Jar
cookiejar.description: Array of cookies to set before making the request

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.description: Local storage data to set in the browser

interceptFetchRequest.title: Intercept Fetch Request
interceptFetchRequest.description: URL pattern(s) to intercept and return (comma-separated for multiple)

fullPageLoad.title: Full Page Load
fullPageLoad.description: Wait for full page load including all resources
